welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # fnbr.js A library to interact with fortnites http and xmpp services ## Installation ``` npm i fnbr ``` ## Example Example: ```javascript const { Client } = require('fnbr'); const client = new Client({ auth: { authorizationCode: '', }, }); client.on('friend:message', (friendMessage) => { console.log(`Message from ${friendMessage.friend.displayName}: ${friendMessage.content}`); if (friendMessage.content.toLowerCase().startsWith('ping')) { friendMessage.author.sendMessage('Pong!'); } }); (async () => { await client.login(); console.log(`Logged in as ${client.user.displayName}`); })(); ``` ## Help Feel free to join [this Discord server](https://discord.gg/HsUFr5f) ## License MIT License Copyright (c) 2020 Nils S. Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

classes.name: Authenticator
classes.description: Represents the authentication manager of a client

props.description: The main client

props.name: auths
props.description: The authentification data

props.name: reauths
props.description: The reauthentification data

props.name: account
props.description: The client's account

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description: Checks if a token refresh is needed and reauthenticates if needed

params.description: Whether the access token should be verified

params.name: token
params.description: The basic token that will be used

params.name: tokenResponse
params.description: The response from the oauth token request

classes.name: Client
classes.description: The main client

props.name: config
props.description: The config of the client

props.name: isReady
props.description: Whether the client is ready or not

props.name: lastMemberMeta
props.description: The default party member meta of the client

props.name: user
props.description: The user of the client

props.name: party
props.description: The party that the client is currently in

props.description: The authentication manager of the client

props.name: friends

props.description: The blocked friends cache of the client's user

props.name: makeCamelCase
props.description: Converts an object's keys to camel case

methods.name: updateCache
methods.description: Refreshes the client's friends (including pending and blocked)

params.name: create
params.description: Whether to create a new one after leaving the current one

methods.name: debug
methods.description: Debug a message via the debug function provided in the client's config (if provided)

params.name: message
params.description: The message that will be debugged

methods.name: waitForEvent
methods.description: Sleep until an event is emitted

params.name: event
params.description: The event will be waited for

methods.name: waitUntilReady
methods.description: Sleep until the client is ready

methods.name: mergeDefault
methods.description: Merges a default object with a given one

params.name: query
params.description: The id, name or email of the account(s) you want to fetch

params.name: status
params.description: The status message; can be null/undefined if you want to reset it

params.name: to
params.description: The display name or the id of the friend; can be undefined if you want to update the presence status for all friends

methods.name: getTournamentWindow

methods.name: getRadioStream
examples:
fs.writeFile('./stream.m3u8', await client.getRadioStream('BXrDueZkosvNvxtx', Enums.Language.ENGLISH));
in cmd: ffmpeg -protocol_whitelist https,file,tcp,tls -i stream.m3u8 -ab 211200 radio.mp3
Known stream ids: BXrDueZkosvNvxtx (BeatBox, en), GEviYjIhzVVzJufW (Yonder, en)
Thanks to cup#9125, mix#9999 and amr#3379

methods.description: Merges a default object with a given one

events.name: ready
events.description: Emitted when the Client is ready

events.name: deviceauth:created
events.description: Emitted when a device auth is created for the client's user

events.name: party:member:message
events.description: Emitted when a member sends a message in the party's chat room

events.description: Emitted when a friend updates his presence

events.description: Emitted when the client receives a message from a friend

events.name: friend:added
events.description: Emitted when a friend request is accepted

events.name: friend:request
events.description: Emitted when the client receives a friend request

events.name: friend:request:sent
events.description: Emitted when the client sends a friend request

events.name: friend:request:aborted
events.description: Emitted when a friend request is aborted

events.name: friend:request:rejected
events.description: Emitted when a friend request is rejected

events.name: friend:removed
events.description: Emitted when a friend is removed

events.name: friend:blocked
events.description: Emitted when a friend is blocked

events.name: friend:unblocked
events.description: Emitted when a friend is unblocked

events.name: party:invite
events.description: Emitted when the client receives a party invite

events.name: party:member:joined
events.description: Emitted when a member joins the party

params.name: partyMember
params.description: The member that joined the party

events.name: party:member:updated
events.description: Emitted when a party member gets updated

events.name: party:member:left
events.description: Emitted when a member leaves the party

events.name: party:member:expired
events.description: Emitted when a party member expires

events.name: party:member:kicked
events.description: Emitted when a party member gets kicked

events.name: party:member:disconnected
events.description: Emitted when a party member gets disconnected

events.name: party:member:promoted
events.description: Emitted when a party member gets promoted

events.name: party:updated
events.description: Emitted when a party member gets updated

events.name: party:invite:declined
events.description: Emitted when a party invite gets declined

params.name: friend
params.description: The friend that declined the party invite

methods.name: setOutfit
setPlaying
methods.description:
Show the client as "in a match" in party
Visually, doesn't actually join a match

params.description: Match player count (must be between 0 and 255)

classes.name: ClientUser

props.description: The first name of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: lastName
props.description: The last name of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: email
props.description: The email of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: failedLoginAttempts
props.description: The number of failed login attempts of the client's Epic Games account

props.description: The last time somebody logged in on the client's Epic Games account

props.name: numberOfDisplayNameChanges
props.description: The number of display name changes of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: ageGroup
props.description: The age group of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: headless
props.description: Whether the account has no display name due to no epicgames account being linked

props.name: country

props.name: preferredLanguage

props.name: canUpdateDisplayName
props.description: Whether the client's Epic Games account can update its display name

props.name: tfaEnabled
props.description: Whether a Two-Factor-Authentification method is enabled

props.name: emailVerified
props.description: Whether the email is verified (now required when creating accounts)

props.name: minorVerified
props.description: Whether the account has been verified to be run by a minor

props.name: minorExpected
props.description: Whether the account is expected to be run by a minor

props.name: minorStatus
props.description: The minor status of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: displayName
props.description: The user's name

props.name: id
props.description: The user's id

props.name: externalAuths
props.description: The user's external auths

props.name: links
props.description: The user's linked accounts

methods.description: Adds this user as a friend or accepts its friend request

methods.name: fetch

props.name: isBlocked
props.description: Whether this friend is blocked or not

props.name: isOnline
props.description:
Whether a user is online or not
Can be inaccurate as it uses the receive date of the last presence

props.name: isJoinable
props.description:
Whether the client can join this friend's party or not
May be slighly inaccurate as it uses the last received presence

classes.name: List
classes.description:
A Map used mainly for cached values throughout fnbr.js but with some extra functions.
Inspired by the simplicity of discord.js's collections.

params.name: iterable
params.description: The iterable that will be used to fill the List

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Finds a key in the List and returns its value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/get

methods.name: set
methods.description:
Maps a key to a value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/set

methods.name: delete
methods.description:
Finds a key and delets the key-value-pair
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/delete

params.name: key
params.description: key of the pair to delete

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Returns a list of all key-value-pairs

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds a value with a function

methods.name: has
methods.description:
Checks if list has a key
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/has

methods.name: some
methods.description: Checks if list has a value using a function

props.description: Whether the XMPP client is connected or not

props.description: Whether the XMPP client is reconnecting or not

props.description: The XMPP client's UUID

props.name: resource
props.description: The XMPP client's resource

props.name: kickedPartyIds
props.description:
This stores the parties which the client got kicked from
You can't accept an invite of a party you got kicked from

methods.description: Setups the XMPP stream and events

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects the XMPP client to Epic Games' services

params.name: isReconnect
params.description: Whether this is a reconnection or not

params.name: status
params.description: The status message; can be null/undefined if you want to reset it

params.name: to
params.description: The XMPP address of the friend; can be undefined if you want to update the presence status for all friends

typedefs.name: PartyPrivacy
typedefs.description:
Represents the privacy of a party:
* `PUBLIC` - anyone can join the party
* `FRIENDS_ALLOW_FRIENDS_OF_FRIENDS` - the client's friends and their friends can join the party
* `FRIENDS` - the client's friends can join the party
* `PRIVATE_ALLOW_FRIENDS_OF_FRIENDS` - the client's friends and their friends can join the party only with an invite
* `PRIVATE` - party is not joinable without an invite from the leader

typedefs.name: Platform
typedefs.description:
Represents the platform of an online Fortnite player:
* `WINDOWS`
* `MAC`
* `PLAYSTATION`
* `XBOX`
* `SWITCH`
* `IOS`
* `ANDROID`

typedefs.name: Playlist
typedefs.description:
Represents a playlist:
* `SOLO`
* `DUO`
* `SQUAD`
* `CREATIVE` - creative don't fill
* `CREATIVE_PLAY` - creative fill

typedefs.name: Language
typedefs.description:
Represents a language (only the ones that are supported by Fortnite):
* `ARABIC`
* `GERMAN`
* `ENGLISH`
* `SPANISH`
* `FRENCH`
* `ITALIAN`
* `JAPANESE`
* `POLISH`
* `RUSSIAN`
* `TURKISH`

typedefs.name: Gamemode
typedefs.description:
Represents a Fortnite gamemode:
* `BATTLE_ROYALE`
* `CREATIVE`
* `SAVE_THE_WORLD`

typedefs.name: KairosColor
typedefs.description:
Represents a Kairos (Party Hub) profile color:
* `TEAL`
* `SWEET_RED`
* `LIGHT_ORANGE`
* `GREEN`
* `LIGHT_BLUE`
* `DARK_BLUE`
* `PINK`
* `RED`
* `GRAY`
* `ORANGE`
* `DARK_PURPLE`
* `LIME`
* `INDIGO`

typedefs.name: DefaultSkin
typedefs.description:
Represents a default skin:
* `FEMALE_1`
* `FEMALE_2`
* `FEMALE_3`
* `FEMALE_4`
* `MALE_1`
* `MALE_2`
* `MALE_3`
* `MALE_4`

typedefs.name: SeasonStart
typedefs.description:
Represents a season's start time:
* `CH1_S1`
* `CH1_S2`
* `CH1_S3`
* `CH1_S4`
* `CH1_S5`
* `CH1_S6`
* `CH1_S7`
* `CH1_S8`
* `CH1_S9`
* `CH1_S10`
* `CH2_S1`
* `CH2_S2`
* `CH2_S3`
* `CH2_S4`

typedefs.name: SeasonEnd
typedefs.description:
Represents a season's end time:
* `CH1_S1`
* `CH1_S2`
* `CH1_S3`
* `CH1_S4`
* `CH1_S5`
* `CH1_S6`
* `CH1_S7`
* `CH1_S8`
* `CH1_S9`
* `CH1_S10`
* `CH2_S1`
* `CH2_S2`
* `CH2_S3`
* `CH2_S4`

typedefs.name: CreatorCodeStatus
typedefs.description:
Represents a creator code status:
* `ACTIVE`
* `INACTIVE`

typedefs.name: PendingFriendDirection
typedefs.description:
Represents a pending friend's direction:
* `INCOMING`
* `OUTGOING`

typedefs.name: ClientOptions
typedefs.description: The options for a client

props.name: savePartyMemberMeta
props.description: Whether to save the party member meta

props.name: http
props.description: The options to be used for the client's HTTP manager

props.name: debug
props.description: Used to send debug messages

props.name: httpDebug
props.description: Whether to send HTTP debug messages

props.name: xmppDebug
props.description: Whether to send XMPP debug messages

props.name: status
props.description: The presence status message of the client's user

props.name: platform
props.description: The platform that will be used for the client's user

props.name: memberMeta
props.description: The client's default member meta for joined parties

props.name: keepAliveInterval
props.description: The client's XMPP connection's keep alive interval

props.name: cachePresences
props.description: Whether friend presences should be cached. NOTE: This will break friend.isOnline, friend.isJoinable and friend.joinParty()

props.name: auth
props.description: The credentials that will be used for client's authentication

props.name: partyConfig
props.description: The default party config

props.name: kairos
props.description: The default kairos config

typedefs.name: HttpOptions
typedefs.description: The options to be used for the client's HTTP manager

props.name: timeout
props.description: The timeout (in milliseconds) of the HTTP requests

props.name: header
props.description: The default headers that will be used for each HTTP request

props.name: json
props.description: Whether to return an HTTP request's response as an JSON object

typedefs.name: ClientAuth
typedefs.description: The credentials that will be used for client's authentication

props.name: deviceAuth
props.description: The device auth's credentials

props.name: exchangeCode
props.description: The exchange code

props.name: authorizationCode
props.description: The authorization code

props.name: refreshToken
props.description: The refresh token

props.name: checkEULA
props.description: Whether EULA should be checked and agreed or not

typedefs.name: PartyConfig
typedefs.description: The party config

props.name: privacy
props.description: The privacy of the party

props.name: joinConfirmation
props.description: Whether joining party needs confirmation

props.name: joinability
props.description: The joinability of the party

props.name: maxSize
props.description: The maximum member size of the party

props.name: chatEnabled
props.description: Whether the chat of the party should be enabled

typedefs.name: KairosConfig
typedefs.description: The Kairos config

props.name: cid
props.description: The CID of the Kairos avatar

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the Kairos avatar

typedefs.name: AuthData
typedefs.description: Contains authorization data for Epic Games' services

props.name: token
props.description: The access token

props.name: expires_at
props.description: The access token's expiration date as ISO string

typedefs.name: AuthAccount
typedefs.description: Contains data of the authorized Epic Games account

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the account

props.name: displayName
props.description: The display name of the account

typedefs.name: FPKairosAvatar
typedefs.description: Contains data about a friend presence's Kairos avatar

props.name: asset
props.description: The avatar's asset

props.name: background
props.description: The avatar's background

typedefs.name: FPGameplayStats
typedefs.description: Contains data about a friend's gameplay stats

props.name: kills
props.description: The kill count of the friends in the gameplay

props.name: fellToDeath
props.description: Whether the friend died

props.name: serverPlayerCount
props.description: The player count on the gameplay's server

typedefs.name: FPPartyData
typedefs.description: Contains data about a friend's party

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the party

props.name: isPrivate
props.description: Whether the party is private or not

props.name: memberCount
props.description: The party's member count

props.name: platform
props.description: The party's platform

props.name: buildId
props.description: The party's build id

typedefs.name: DeviceAuthCredentials
typedefs.description: Contains a device auth's credentials

props.name: accountId
props.description: The account id of the device auth

props.name: deviceId
props.description: The id of the device auth

props.name: secret
props.description: The secret of the device auth

typedefs.name: BasicToken
typedefs.description:
Represents a Fortnite basic access token:
* `LAUNCHER_WINDOWS`
* `FORTNITE_WINDOWS`
* `FORTNITE_IOS`

typedefs.name: PartyLock
typedefs.description:
The client's party lock
Used for delaying all party-related xmpp events while changes to client's party are made

props.name: active
props.description: Indicates if the party lock is active

props.name: wait
props.description: Sleep until party lock is no longer active

typedefs.name: ReauthLock
typedefs.description:
The client's reauthentication lock
Used for delaying all Http requests while the client is reauthenticating

props.name: active
props.description: Indicates if the reauthentication lock is active

props.name: wait
props.description: Sleep until reauthentication lock is no longer active
